00440 SubRouteRequestPacket::setRouteID( uint32 routeID )

00476 inline void
00477 SubRouteRequestPacket::setRouteToAll(bool routeToAll)
00478 {

00480              routeToAll);
00481 }

00529 SubRouteRequestPacket::incNbrSubRoutes()
